title: client lag
body: Hi guys did you have the same problem as me i am in bulgaria and i have rly big lag with my client i cant start a game or load lool store or things like that i saw some other guys with the same problem and its only in eu did

replies.body:
We've noticed that EU, Bulgaria especially, has been having some pretty hefty connection issues in the past week or so. We're still working on figuring out what the main source of the problem is, but in the meantime try giving [**these steps**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu) a shot. 

If those steps aren't seeming to help at all, hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your network logs, and they have a few other tricks you can try!
